title: Micro-Focus Drill Variant #5
brief: Practice your focus with a unique micro-drill.

steps.label: Step 2: Scan Horizontal
steps.code: Scan the top surface horizontally, finding an edge piece.

steps.label: Step 3: Find a Corner Piece
steps.code: Look for a corner piece that matches one of your fingers.

steps.label: Step 4: Orient and Permute
steps.code: Orient the cube so the found corner is on top, then permutate to find its correct position.

steps.label: Step 5: Repeat Process
steps.code: Repeat steps 2-4 until you have completed one layer of the cube.
